sources.title: 2012: Doomsday | Full Movie | Action Adventure Disaster
sources.description:
2012: Doomsday - On December 21, 2012 four strangers on a journey of faith are drawn to an ancient temple in the heart of Mexico. For the Mayans it is the last recorded day. For NASA scientists it is a cataclysmic polar shift. For the rest of us, it is Doomsday.
2008.  Stars: Cliff De Young, Dale Midkiff, Ami Dolenz
**Under license from The Asylum.  All rights reserved**

metadata.Plot: On December 21, 2012 four strangers on a journey of faith are drawn to an ancient temple in the heart of Mexico. For the Mayans it is the last recorded day. For NASA scientists it is a cataclysmic polar shift. For the rest of us, it is Doomsday.
metadata.Actors: Cliff De Young, Dale Midkiff, Ami Dolenz, Danae Nason
